short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Make Chrome Remote Desktop show links rather than codes

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: You can make links that pre-fill the "Give Support" box in Chrome Remote Desktop. This makes it easier for you to give access to your computer to someone else who is unfamiliar with Chrome Remote Desktop. This extension causes the "Give Support" page to show these links rather than the codes. This is *NOT* an official extension.
